name: Rachel's Grasp
description:
Rachel's Grasp is a 2D Adventure Platformer.  

It follows the story of Rachel, fallen into the depths of her own mind as she struggles to find control within herself.

This is a prototype for a Narrative based story I wish to tell. This project is heavily influenced by Celeste and Night in the Woods in the approach taken. Hopefully I can tell the story I wish through it. The project will be updated slowly as the year passes by with the aim to be a full demo later in the year. (Fingers crossed! I had way too much planned for this.🤕) 

Stay tuned for updates!
